snippet.title: Oppidum | Official Reveal Trailer | Steam, PS, Xbox
snippet.description:
Oppidum, a story-driven co-op survival adventure for 1-4 players, is finally coming to Steam, PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X|S and Xbox One - ✨ April 23, 2025! ✨

WISHLIST ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2115760/Oppidum/?utm_source=socialmedia&utm_medium=youtube&utm_term=RTrailer

Where to find more?
Discord: https://discord.gg/b5MhStZk9N
Newsletter: http://playoppidum.com/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@play.oppidum
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PlayOppidum
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/playoppidum/
Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/playoppidum.com

#Steam #Switch #PS4 #PS5 #xboxone #xboxseriesx #xboxseriess
